arts.ttl: Real Madrid given huge boost as veteran returns to team training ahead of Juventus clash
arts.sum: This could be a season-defining week for Real Madrid as they prepare for two high-profile encounters in the coming days. Xabi Alonso’s men kick things off with a UEFA Champions League encounter against Juventus on Wednesday night, before taking on arch-rivals FC Barcelona in La Liga on Sunday.
